AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Shadowbolt recruiter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Together with other Shadowbolts, [PAWN_nameDef] sought out those who questioned the justice and correctness of the existing order. [PAWN_pronoun] tried to win them over to [PAWN_possessive] side.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Shadowbolt marauder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] entire adult life among the Shadowbolts, unquestioningly following their instructions. During battles, [PAWN_pronoun] was always at the forefront of the attack, demonstrating incredible speed and strength.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: poultry farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed taking care of plants and animals. [PAWN_pronoun] curiously observed the world of flora and fauna, paying special attention to birds and finding something special and unique in them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: winged rescuer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: One day, walking in the woods late at night, [PAWN_nameDef] got into trouble. [PAWN_pronoun] was saved by a brave stranger who happened to be nearby. [PAWN_nameDef] was amazed by such bravery and dedication, so [PAWN_pronoun] decided to devote life to helping other ponies, striving to be like [PAWN_possessive] protector.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: pegasus fighter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: While serving in the Pegasus regiment of the Royal Guard, [PAWN_nameDef] tried to stand out from the others as much as possible. During constant training, [PAWN_pronoun] masterfully honed [PAWN_possessive] flying skills, mastered aerial combat and learned how to deftly parry blows using wings with maximum effectiveness.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: officer of Pegasus Guard
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] devoted [PAWN_possessive] life to serving in the Guard, protecting the peace of citizens and accompanying important people on various diplomatic missions. Years passed, but [PAWN_pronoun] continued to fulfill duty to the kingdom, until finally [PAWN_pronoun] received a well-deserved promotion to the rank of officer.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: flying racer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] watched the pegasus competitions with admiration. [PAWN_pronoun] set {PAWN_gender ? himself : herself} the goal of becoming as successful and outstanding as the most famous sports ponies. [PAWN_nameDef] devoted all [PAWN_possessive] time to training, tirelessly honing flying skills.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: pilot inventor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: One day [PAWN_nameDef] met a pegasus who couldn't fly. [PAWN_possessive] heart was full of compassion, and [PAWN_pronoun] could not live peacefully knowing that there was someone nearby who was deprived of something so important. Then [PAWN_nameDef] decided to become an inventor and set {PAWN_gender ? himself : herself} an important life goal â€” to make all the unfortunate ponies happy again.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: weather controller
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] devoted most of life to weather management and often worked with local meteorologists. [PAWN_pronoun] was sure that this kind of activity was [PAWN_possessive] true vocation.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: meteorologist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] came from a family that had been fascinated by weather forecasting for many generations. Unsurprisingly, [PAWN_pronoun] shared this passion. [PAWN_pronoun] devoted a huge amount of time to meteorology, which was the reason for failures in [PAWN_possessive] personal life.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: employee of Rainbow Factory
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was fascinated by the rainbow. After getting a job at a special factory, [PAWN_pronoun] began to make various products from it.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: cloud sculptor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was crazy about clouds. As an adult, [PAWN_pronoun] turned into a skilled craftsman, able to give them any shape at will.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rainbow cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] enthusiastically studied books on the national cuisine of pegasus. [PAWN_possessive] knowledge of cooking a variety of exotic dishes from liquid rainbow was almost perfect and made [PAWN_objective] famous far beyond the borders of native country.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: slave of Shadowbolts
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: One day, during a carefree walk through the forest, [PAWN_nameDef] was kidnapped by Shadowbolts. From that day on, [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to serve them until [PAWN_pronoun] was rescued.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: leader of Shadowbolts
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became part of the Shadowbolt team and enthusiastically adopted the experience of [PAWN_possessive] new comrades. Soon, [PAWN_pronoun] showed leadership qualities that allowed [PAWN_objective] to take the place of honor as a leader.
